td.content: s:patient presents with mild epigastric pain for 2 days. pt also reports Stomach. pt is a f aged 44 ys. o:Height 63 in, Weight 111 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild tenderness to deep palpitation a:Ulcers p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed famotidine - 40 mg daily, and ordered serum helicobacter pylori assay.

s:a f interrogator aged 46 yrs describes moderate epigastric pain, moderate dyspepsia and moderate abdominal pain. she reports having no more than one drink a day Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 64 in, Weight 113 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, no rebound tenderness, HEENT: WNL, all lung fields a:Ulcers p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed pantoprazole - 40 mg daily, and ordered Barium Swallow Study.
